author: Brian Turner
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. Place the cheese on the toasted muffin halves and place into the oven for 3-4 minutes, or until the cheese is melted.  Heat the olive oil together with the butter in a pan and add the spinach. Cook for about one minute, or until the spinach is wilted, then season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.  Spoon the spinach onto a serving plate and top with the cheesy muffins.
ingredients: 55g/2oz Wensleydale cheese, sliced,  1 English muffin, split and toasted,  1 tbsp olive oil,  15g/Â½oz butter,  1 handful spinach leaves,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
